roleset.name: to express enthusiastically
roleset.note: GUSH-V NOTES: Frames file for 'gush' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from gush.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: gush about
example.text: Glossy brochures circulated [*] at racetracks gush about the limelight of the winner 's circle and high-society schmoozing .
example.arg: about the limelight of the winner 's circle and high-society schmoozing

example.name: transitive
example.text: [`` He 's a genuine Wheaties-box athlete , '']-1 gushes [*T*-1]Mr. Jones .

roleset.name: (cause to) flow
roleset.note: GUSH-V NOTES: Frames file for 'gush' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from gush.02-v predicate notes)

example.name: not in the corpus
example.text: Oil gushed out from the hole in the tanker .
example.arg: out from the hole in the tanker
